castInfo.info: Michael 'Mike' Wheeler is the son of Karen and Ted, younger brother of Nancy and older brother of Holly, and is friends with Will Byers, Lucas Sinclair, and Dustin Henderson. Mike is an intelligent and conscientious student who is committed to his friends.         In their Dungeons and Dragons party, Mike is their paladin and usually plays the role of Dungeon Master. He develops romantic feelings for Eleven (or El, as Mike and his friends prefer to call her). In Season Two, it is revealed that he has developed a more rebellious streak, likely stemming from missing Eleven.
